hero.title: MIRANA
hero.description: As she takes aim from a distance with her deadly arrow, Mirana must always be ready to leap into battle. Able to shield her allies from the eyes of her enemies, she ensures that her team is always on the prowl.
hero.textA: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 650.0 radius will be struck a second time for 75.0% of the damage.
hero.textB: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.0 to 2.6 seconds, with bonus damage up to 150.0 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
hero.textC: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 4.0 seconds.
hero.textU: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.

hero.title: PUCK
hero.description: Puck has a talent for confounding its enemies with playfully elusive mischief. By teleporting to its damaging orb in order to hop short distances, it attacks foes with bursts of silencing dust. By the time its enemies can react, Puck has long since escaped.
hero.textA: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
hero.textB: Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
hero.textC: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
hero.textU: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, damaging and leashing them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.

hero.title: SLARDAR
hero.description: Ready to find and demolish his foes, Slardar quickly slithers into battle. After exposing an enemy's position and shattering their defenses, he closes the distance to lock them in place with crushing blows and powerful bashes from his trident.
hero.textA: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units. Slardar gains bonus movement speed, health regeneration and armor while in a puddle or river.
hero.textB: Slams the ground, leaving a puddle of water, and stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.
hero.textC: After 3.0 attacks, your next attack will bash the target. Deals double damage against creeps. Passively grants bonus damage to Slardar while he's in water.
hero.textU: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight and vision of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility. The enemy unit leaves a trail of water behind it for 8 seconds.

hero.title: SHADOW FIEND
hero.description: Capturing souls from every kill he makes, Shadow Fiend is always gathering his power. Every assault, each carefully aimed raze that kills an enemy, brings him closer to unleashing his gathered souls in a deadly blast of scouring energy.
hero.textA: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack. Each consecutive stack also decreases movement speed.
hero.textB: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. On death, he releases 30.0% of them from bondage.
hero.textC: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies. Every enemy hero killed nearby further improves armor reduction by 2.0 for 20.0s.
hero.textU: Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed and magic resistance reduced for 0.7 seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of 2.1. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery.

hero.title: SLARK
hero.description: Pouncing into danger then slipping back out is what Slark does best. He rushes at the chance to pin or corner a lone foe, steals their essence with each cut from his dagger, and is always ready to vanish should the tables turn.
hero.textA: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging most negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself.  Slark only takes 30.0% of the damage.
hero.textB: Slark leaps forward, leashing the first hero he connects with and applying Essence Shift Stacks.  That unit can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.
hero.textC: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility. If Slark kills an affected enemy hero, he permanently steals 1.0 Agility.
hero.textU: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark.  Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.

hero.title: INVOKER
hero.description: With an intricate arsenal of spells at his disposal, Invoker can adapt to any battle situation. Each configuration of his three spell components yields of one of ten spells, meaning he's never without a way to destroy or escape his enemies.
hero.textA: Allows manipulation of ice elements. Passively grants +1.0 Strength per level. Each Quas instance imbues Invoker's spells with Spell Lifesteal.
hero.textB: Allows manipulation of storm elements. Passively grants +1.0 Agility per level. Each Wex instance provides increased cooldown reduction and movement speed.
hero.textC: Allows manipulation of fire elements. Passively grants +1.0 Intelligence per level. Each Exort instance imbues Invoker's spells with Spell Amplification.
hero.textU: Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated to create a new spell for Invoker to use. Invoke cooldown is reduced by 0.3 seconds for each orb level.

hero.title: AXE
hero.description: One after another, Axe cuts down his foes. Marching ahead of his team, he locks his enemies in battle then counters their blows with a deadly spin of his weapon. Slamming his culling blade through a weakened enemy, he is always charging onward.
hero.textA: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him at high speed, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
hero.textB: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The damage is increased by a factor of Axe's armor. The enemy is also slowed as long as they are facing away from Axe.
hero.textC: After a set number of attacks, Axe will perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
hero.textU: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, Axe gains bonus armor permanently and all nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.

hero.title: TINY
hero.description: Growing to tremendous size and strength as the battle progresses, Tiny's power can quickly become terrifying. He tosses heroes and creeps at his enemies, or stuns them beneath an avalanche. Should he gather his full strength, he can demolish the enemy's base with ease.
hero.textA: Bombards an area with rocks, continously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units. Avalanche does 2.0x damage to units being tossed.
hero.textB: Grabs the nearest unit in a 300.0 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.
hero.textC: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.
hero.textU: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, and armor, and toss power while slowing his attack speed.

hero.title: PHANTOM ASSASSIN
hero.description: The moment she finds her prey, Phantom Assassin strikes. Instantly closing in on a target, she effortlessly dodges attacks as she relentlessly cuts away at her foe. Without warning, any one of her attacks could prove suddenly and brutally fatal.
hero.textA: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing 65.0+25.0% of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.
hero.textB: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed and lifesteal while attacking if it's an enemy unit.
hero.textC: Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks. Can be activated to blur her body, causing her to be impossible to see until near enemy heroes, towers, or outposts.
hero.textU: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, acquiring a chance of gaining Deadly Focus with each attack. When attacking with Deadly Focus, Phantom Assassin will consume the buff and guarantee a critical hit. Stifling Dagger has a bonus chance to cause Deadly Focus.

hero.title: MEEPO
hero.description: By summoning up to five permanent copies of himself, Meepo can fight from every front at once. Spreading his clones throughout the battlefield, when an enemy is found, he binds his foe, gathers his selves with an explosive teleport, then buries what remains.
hero.textA: Tosses a net at the target point, rooting down all enemy units in an area around it.
hero.textB: Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for 1.5 seconds, damaging the enemy in both the departure and arrival locations.
hero.textC: Steals health from the enemy with each strike and heals all other Meepos for that amount.
hero.textU: Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience, attributes and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears.  If any of the clones die, they all die. Divided We Stand grants all Meepos bonus Magic Resistance.

hero.title: BLOODSEEKER
hero.description: Bloodseeker forces difficult decisions on his enemies. Able to drive his foes to a retreat by bathing a large area with a damaging ritual, his gruesome ultimate asks his opponents to hold still, or die.
hero.textA: Drives Bloodseeker into a bloodthirsty rage which causes him to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of his health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.
hero.textB: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 2.9 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
hero.textC: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, restoring some life when he kills a unit. Restores for half values when denying, or if an ally kills a nearby enemy hero. Also gains bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below 80.0%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25.0%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.
hero.textU: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.

hero.title: MONKEY KING
hero.description: Always in search of a good fight, Monkey King travels atop the trees aiming to spring from leafy cover and surprise his enemies. Calling upon an army of monkey soldiers to overwhelm opponents, this agile trickster revels in the chaos of battle, ready to slam his legendary staff down on any hopes of escape.
hero.textA: Monkey King enlarges his staff and slams it against the ground, stunning enemies in a line and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Has True Strike.
hero.textB: Monkey King jumps to a tree and perches atop it. While perched, he gains the Primal Spring ability-a channeled leap attack. If Monkey King's tree is destroyed, he falls and is stunned for 4 seconds. Taking damage from player controlled units or Roshan while on the ground puts Tree Dance on cooldown.
hero.textC: Monkey King's attacks awaken the Jingu Bang's power. Upon the fourth hit on the same enemy hero, Monkey King earns four charged attacks that have bonus damage and lifesteal.
hero.textU: Monkey King creates a circular formation of soldiers that spread out from his position. If Monkey King leaves the area his soldiers disperse. The soldiers have Monkey King's attack and only target heroes. Monkey King is granted bonus armor for the spell's duration.

hero.title: PUDGE
hero.description: Each carefully aimed throw of Pudge's signature hook strikes fear into his foes. Pulling his enemies near to carve them with his cleavers, he gains additional health and damage with every kill, and soon becomes an unstoppable killer.
hero.textA: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge, killing it if it's a non-ancient creep and dealing damage if it is an enemy otherwise.
hero.textB: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
hero.textC: Gives Pudge damage block against all sources. Passively grants bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
hero.textU: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Damage is increased by Pudge's Strength and heals him for the total amount. Pudge pulls the unit at a rate of 75.0 units, up to a minimum of 125.0 range. Lasts longer on creeps.

hero.title: EARTHSHAKER
hero.description: Whether blocking an enemy's escape, dividing their forces, or shattering the ground beneath gathered foes, Earthshaker is at his best when he strikes without warning. Whatever survives the aftershocks still has a swing from his mighty totem to look forward to.
hero.textA: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
hero.textB: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have 100.0 bonus attack range on the next attack.
hero.textC: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
hero.textU: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.

hero.title: LICH
hero.description: Drifting from battle to battle and sacrificing creeps to fuel his assaults, Lich is always ready to help his fellow heroes destroy their enemies with slowing frost. Should his foes be foolish enough to gather, his bouncing ultimate will ensure their demise.
hero.textA: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4.0 seconds.  The primary target receives both base and area damage.
hero.textB: Applies a magical frost shield around the target, reducing damage from attacks against it. While the shield is active, ice magic will affect nearby enemy units every 1.0 seconds, dealing minor damage and slowing them.
hero.textC: CHANNELED - Hypnotizes an enemy unit, causing it to move towards a point between the two of you and drains a percentage of its current mana. If cast on a creep lasts 2.0x longer and deals 250.0 damage per second.
hero.textU: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to 10.0 times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. Each bounce increases the damage for the subsequent bounces.

hero.title: QUEEN OF PAIN
hero.description: Queen of Pain strikes without warning, destroying gathered foes with deafening screams. Should an enemy survive her onslaught, she slows their escape with a throw of her dagger before finishing them off.
hero.textA: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 15.0 seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every 3.0 seconds. Queen of Pain relishes in the pain inflicted, healing every time the enemy takes damage. Creeps heal for half the damage only.
hero.textB: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.
hero.textC: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
hero.textU: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake and pushing them back.

hero.title: STORM SPIRIT
hero.description: Storm Spirit is never one to miss a fight. Zipping from across the battlefield in a bolt of lightning, he strikes enemies from every direction with exploding remnants and charged attacks, then disappears while his enemies are still scrambling to react.
hero.textA: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12.0 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
hero.textB: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.
hero.textC: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
hero.textU: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 25.0+7.5% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 10.0+0.7% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
